page.title: 16Children's Games In School 1
page.content: Traditional games are still popular with children in the playground. Favourite playground games are, French Skipping, Hopscotch, Leap Frog and variations on the game of Tick. The variations are,"Cops and Robbers", "Behind the White Line"," Pom Pom", "Sticky Witches" and "Foxes and Farmers". The older children teach the younger children the rules of the games. The children go through phases of playing games such as marbles, army, horses and the younger children like playing "families". In the Autumn, conker contests can often be seen.
